No	NULL	No	NULL	NULL	walkway width 1.5m	No	No	No	staircase	NULL	Yes	Nearby grade-separate walkway within 100m	98	Exit A leads to a verge that further leads to nowhere.  There is no proper crossing (BFA or not) for pedestrians to reach the verge and hence Exit A.  Therefore pedestrians are not supposed access NU4 from Exit A to Exit B.  Although pedestrians may walk from Exit B to Exit A they will then find themselves at an isolated spot.    Disabled persons who want to access the underpass from Exit B they may take an alternative route by using an at-grade crossing 98m away and then cross the underpass from Exit D to Exit C.    By having the aforesaid features Exit A is classifed as BFA compliant (with alternative BFA route) for the purpose of classification.
